setweight.name: setweight
setweight.description: Set the weight of a Key Staff position

addadditionalstaff.name: addadditionalstaff
addadditionalstaff.description: Add additional staff to an episode

removeadditionalstaff.name: removeadditionalstaff
removeadditionalstaff.description: Remove additional staff from an episode

swapadditionalstaff.name: swapadditionalstaff
swapadditionalstaff.description: Swap additional staff into an episode

transferownership.description: Transfer project ownership to someone else

undone.name: undone
undone.description: Mark a position as not done

blame.name: blame
blame.description: Check the status of a project

addobserver.name: addobserver
addobserver.description: Add a server to observe this project

removeobserver.name: removeobserver
removeobserver.description: Remove a server observing this project

roster.name: roster
roster.description: See who's working on an episode

explain.name: explain
explain.description: Explain what any of this even means

number.name: number
number.description: What is being released? [Number or Range]

strings.permissionDenied: You do not have permission to do that.
strings.aliasInUse: That alias is already in use in `$ALIASPROJ`.
strings.aliasAdded: I added $ALIAS as an alias for `$PROJECT` for you.
strings.aliasRemoved: I removed the alias $ALIAS from `$PROJECT` for you.
strings.addEpisode: I added episode $NUMBER to `$PROJECT` for you.
strings.removeEpisode: I removed episode $NUMBER from `$PROJECT` for you.
strings.addObserver: I added the observer $OBSERVINGGUILD to `$PROJECT` for you.
strings.removeObserver: I removed the observer $OBSERVINGGUILD from `$PROJECT` for you.
strings.blameFailure: The project is complete, or the specified episode could not be found.
strings.doneFailure: Your task is complete for all episodes, or the specified episode could not be found.
strings.deleteProject: Cleaned out the `$PROJECT` project for you. 残念。
strings.taskCompleteBody: Nice job getting the **$TASKNAME** for episode $EPISODE done.
strings.taskIncompleteBody: So the episode $EPISODE **$TASKNAME** wasn't done, after all. Typical.
strings.taskSkippedBody:
**$TASKNAME** for episode $EPISODE has been skipped.
If you wish to do it for realsies, `/undone` it first.
strings.airTimeFail: Air time must be a 24-hour HH:MM time, ex: 16:30
strings.episodeReleasedBody:
Nice job releasing **$TITLE $TYPE $PUBLISHNUMBER**!
I'm proud of you!
strings.swapAdditionalStaff: Swapped <@$STAFF> in for position $ABBREVIATION for episode $EPISODE.
strings.noRoster: There are no key staff assigned to that project.
strings.inTheDust:
Your team is still working on episode **$CURRENTEPISODE**, but your task there is already done.
The next episode awaiting **$TASKNAME** is episode **$NEXTEPISODE**; did you want me to mark that one done instead?
strings.noResponse: I waited a whole minute, and you didn't tell me what you wanted!
strings.dontDoIt: Okay; I won't touch anything, then.
strings.doItNow:
Okay, I'll do that for you.
**$TASKNAME** is now **$DIFF** episode ahead.
strings.doItNowPlural:
Okay, I'll do that for you.
**$TASKNAME** is now **$DIFF** episodes ahead.
strings.choice: What do you want me to do?
strings.anidbApiError: Air date unknown: AniDB API error
strings.anidbRequestEmpty: Air date unknown: AniDB request empty
strings.anidbNotSpecified: Air date unknown: Not specified on AniDB
